snippet: Pope Francis said in remarks to the leadership of a Latin American church group that while there were many holy people in the Vatican, there was also “a current of corruption.”
abstract: Pope Francis reportedly admits presence of 'gay lobby' and 'current of corruption' in the Vatican, in private remarks to leadership of a Latin American church group; acknowledgment appears to confirm reports that the Vatican had denied in February.
lead_paragraph: Pope Francis said in remarks to the leadership of a Latin American church group that while there were many holy people in the Vatican, there was also “a current of corruption.”

headline.main: Pope Said to Speak About ‘Gay Lobby’
headline.print_headline: Pope Said to Speak About ‘Gay Lobby’
